e.  I wonder why people keep bringing up

Second,=
 in most cases I find that asserting solely on an exception
> type is insuf=
ficient. Often (not always) I'm asserting some
> postcondition in the catch=
 block, or I'm asserting some nuance of the

age, typically).

ert to the old
